rows.label: qev092602_MSG0001
rows.name:
What is it, human friends?
Needing something from great elder Nan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0002
rows.name:
We need a coin for the Nopon Commerce Guild.
Would you mind telling us how to get one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0003
rows.name: This again? Tora came by with same question earlier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh, well if Tora's already spoken to you,
then you know the situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0005
rows.name: Seems like he needs it as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0006
rows.name: Tora not yet meet requirements![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0007
rows.name: Then Tora will meet them. Tora do ANYTHING![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0008
rows.name:
It not so simple. Aspiring member
of guild must help make coin himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0009
rows.name: And three rare materials are required to forge coin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0009_02
rows.name: Gathering all three is extremely fearsome task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0010
rows.name:
But act of gathering proves Nopon
worthy of guild membership![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0011
rows.name: If Tora try now, Tora fail. Probably die horribly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0012
rows.name: Tora not die. Friends will do dangerous parts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0013
rows.name: Um, yeah, okay. I mean, I'm willing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0014
rows.name: But it sounds like that's no good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0015
rows.name:
Based on what Elder Nan said,
you need to get these three materials yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Ah. Tora miss that part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0017
rows.name:
But Commerce Guild mission statement
also say use anything and anyone for money![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0017_2
rows.name: Tora read it in charter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0018
rows.name: What? That is one bonkers credo...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0019
rows.name: Elder Nan...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0019_2
rows.name:
Tora thinks that using BLADE friends
as gofers is within spirit of Guild rules.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0020
rows.name: Hrmrmrmrmr...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0021
rows.name: Mrrrrrmrmrmrmrmrmr...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0079
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0080
rows.name:
Say that Tora's ability to talk you into
this nonsense must count for something.

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0081
rows.name: Bribe

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0082
rows.name: Offer to introduce Elder Nan to some cute Nopon later.

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0022
rows.name: Hrmrmr... It does show ingenuity at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0023
rows.name:
And choosing safest option does
prove healthy aversion to risk...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0024
rows.name: Very well. Nan allow it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0025_m
rows.name: Gah! How does BLADE friend know about Nan's weakness?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0025_f
rows.name: Gah! How does BLADE friend know about Nan's weakness?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0026_m
rows.name: Friend is better negotiator than Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0026_f
rows.name: Friend is better negotiator than Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0027
rows.name: Nan not like it, but BLADEs may accompany Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0028
rows.name: BUT! Nan not doing this because of bribe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0029
rows.name: Nan simply respects Tora's resourcefulness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0030
rows.name: YESSS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0031
rows.name: Quick, tell Tora what three materials are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0032
rows.name:
Calm jumpy self and listen!
Three materials needed to make coin are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0033
rows.name: Bonjelium, floatstone shard, and lucky rainbow whisker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0034
rows.name: All are very difficult to find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0035
rows.name: Use all you know to track them down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0036
rows.name:
Tora give 100 percent.
BLADE friends give much more than that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0037
rows.name: Um, thanks?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0038
rows.name: So what do we do once we have all three?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0039
rows.name:
Bring here. Elder Nan will then explain
next step in forging process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0083
rows.name: Did friends forget materials needed to make coin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0084
rows.name:
Three ingredients are bonjelium, floatstone shard,
and lucky rainbow whisker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0085
rows.name:
Nopon learn necessary skills of trading over course of
acquiring them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0086
rows.name:
Bring those materials here, and Elder Nan will make
coin for friends as special thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0040
rows.name: Elder! Tora has all three materials![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0041
rows.name:
Hurry and make coin!
Let Tora into Nopon Commerce Guild![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0042
rows.name:
Give them here. 
Only wise elder can judge if materials are worthy of coin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0043
rows.name: Hrm... Yes, are all here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0044
rows.name: Oh, good. So, what comes next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0045
rows.name: Next is most difficult part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0046
rows.name:
Coin must be forged according to
ancient ritual passed down through ages.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0047
rows.name: Only one Nopon still living who can perform mystic ceremony.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0048
rows.name: Tora not have time to search for old man![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0049
rows.name: Do you know where this old Nopon is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0050
rows.name: Nan know exactly where old Nopon is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0051
rows.name: IT NAN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0052
rows.name: Saw that coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0053
rows.name: Stop self-indulgent gags and make stupid coin already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0054
rows.name: Youth today have no respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0055
rows.name: Hurry! Tora need it before dadapon and mamapon get back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0056
rows.name: Nan understand schedule.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0057
rows.name: But Tora must understand this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0058
rows.name: Forging of coin of Commerce Guild no simple task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0059
rows.name:
First, materials Tora gathered are melted.
Then materials sit for three days—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0060
rows.name: Three days?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0061
rows.name: THAT TOO LONG![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0062
rows.name: Then mixture heated slowly for 180 more days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0063
rows.name: That's half a year![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0064
rows.name: INSANITY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0065
rows.name: So, uh... I'm guessing that's too late?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0066
rows.name:
Far too late...
Tora begin bracing for shame now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0067
rows.name:
Why so much whining?
Nan already said Nan understand schedule.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0068
rows.name: But half-year is—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0069
rows.name: Nan has decided to give Tora pre-made coin instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0070
rows.name: Whaaat?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0071
rows.name:
Nan keep few dozen lying around.
Can hand one over right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0072
rows.name: Wow! Elder Nan is best elder![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0073
rows.name:
No need to flatter Nan.
Tora lack experience, but clearly has sharp mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0074
rows.name:
Tora must put wits to use for sake of
Nopon Commerce Guild from now on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0075
rows.name: Thank you, Elder! Tora will![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0076
rows.name:
Let's hurry and find your parents, Tora.
You've got a coin to show off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0077
rows.name: Yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0077_2
rows.name: Friends should head for Oblivia and find Dorian Caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092602_MSG0078
rows.name: That is where Tora meet dadapon and mamapon each year.[ST:wait ]
